articles.author: Andre Janse Van Vuuren, Sagarika Jaisinghani
articles.title: Asian Stocks to Rise as Fed’s Rate Cut Lifts Mood: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The equity rally spurred by a US interest-rate cut and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s sanguine economic outlook unraveled after Oracle Corp. reignited concerns about the vast spending tied to artificial intelligence.
articles.content: The equity rally spurred by a US interest-rate cut and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powells sanguine economic outlook unraveled after Oracle Corp. reignited concerns about the vast spending tied to a… [+407 chars]
